issue.title: [R] Unvendor cpp11
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13610](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13610). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
cpp11 was vendored in ARROW-13608. Presumably they will have done a release with a fix prior to our next release.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13610?focusedCommentId=17419294) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
cpp11 just released + hit CRAN yesterday (9/22), so we can attempt to unvendor this now.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13610?focusedCommentId=17470958) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11360
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11360>
